    • Constructor Detail

      • MRRTopNMetric

        public MRRTopNMetric(String pre,
                     String sfx,
                     int listSize,
                     ItemSelector candidates,
                     ItemSelector exclude,
                     ItemSelector goodItems)
        Construct a new recall and precision top n metric
        Parameters:
        pre - the prefix label for this evaluation, or null for no prefix.
        sfx - the suffix label for this evaluation, or null for no suffix.
        listSize - The number of recommendations to fetch.
        candidates - The candidate selector, provides a list of items which can be recommended
        exclude - The exclude selector, provides a list of items which must not be recommended (These items are removed from the candidate items to form the final candidate set)
        goodItems - The list of items to consider "true positives", all other items will be treated as "false positives".

    • Method Detail

      • getPrefix

        protected String getPrefix()
        Description copied from class: AbstractMetric
        A prefix to be applied to column names. If non-null, this prefix will be applied and separated with a period.
        Overrides:

        The prefix to apply to column names.

      • createContext

        public MRRTopNMetric.Context createContext(Attributed algo,
                                           TTDataSet ds,
                                           Recommender rec)
        Description copied from interface: Metric
        Create the context for an experimental condition (algorithm/data set pair).
        Parameters:
        algo - The algorithm.
        ds - The data set.
        rec - The LensKit recommender, if applicable. This can be null for an external algorithm that does not provide a LensKit recommender.
        Returns:
        The accumulator. This will be passed to Metric.measureUser(TestUser, Object). If the metric does not accumulate any results, this method can return null.

      • doMeasureUser

        public MRRTopNMetric.UserResult doMeasureUser(TestUser user,
                                              MRRTopNMetric.Context context)
        Description copied from class: AbstractMetric
        Measure a user with typed results.
        Specified by:
        doMeasureUser in class AbstractMetric<MRRTopNMetric.Context,MRRTopNMetric.AggregateResult,MRRTopNMetric.UserResult>
        Parameters:
        user - The user to measure.
        context - The context.
        Returns:
        The results of measuring the user, or null to emit NAs for the user.

      • getTypedResults

        protected MRRTopNMetric.AggregateResult getTypedResults(MRRTopNMetric.Context context)
        Description copied from class: AbstractMetric
        Get the typed results from an accumulator.
        Specified by:
